{#if channel}
{#if isVoiceChannel} ðŸŽ¤ {:else} ðŸ’¬ {/if}

{channel.name}

{#if channel.description} {channel.description} {/if}
{#if isVoiceChannel}
{#if hasVoiceConnection} ðŸ”´ Live {:else} ðŸŽ¤ Voice Channel {/if}
{/if}
{#if isVoiceChannel} {/if}
{#if isLoadingOlder}
Loading older messages...
{/if} {#if channelMessages.length === 0 && !$chatStore.isLoadingMessages}
{#if isVoiceChannel} ðŸŽ¤ {:else} ðŸ’¬ {/if}

Welcome to #{channel.name}!

{#if isVoiceChannel} This is a voice channel. Join the voice chat to start talking with others. {:else} This is the beginning of your conversation in #{channel.name}. {/if}

{/if} {#each channelMessages as message, index (message?.id || index)} {@const prevMessage = channelMessages[index - 1]} {@const isGrouped = message && prevMessage && prevMessage.authorId === message.authorId && new Date(message.createdAt).getTime() - new Date(prevMessage.createdAt).getTime() < 300000} {#if message}
{/if} {/each} {#if $chatStore.typingUsers.length > 0}
{formatTypingUsers($chatStore.typingUsers)}
{/if} {#if $chatStore.isLoadingMessages}
Loading messages...
{/if}
{#if showScrollToBottom} {/if}
{#if !isVoiceChannel} {/if} {:else}
ðŸ’¬

No channel selected

Select a channel from the sidebar to start chatting.

{/if}

{#if message.replyTo}
{message.replyTo.author.username} {message.replyTo.content.slice(0, 50)}{message.replyTo.content.length > 50 ? '...' : ''}
{/if}
{message.author.username} {formattedTime} {#if message.isEdited} (edited) {/if}
{#if isEditing}
{:else}
{message.content}
{/if} {#if message.attachments?.length}
{#each message.attachments as attachment}
{#if attachment.mimeType.startsWith('image/')} {:else}
ðŸ“Ž {attachment.filename} {(attachment.size / 1024).toFixed(1)}KB
{/if}
{/each}
{/if} {#if message.reactions?.length}
{#each message.reactions as reaction} {/each}
{/if}
{#if showActions && !isEditing}
{#if isOwnMessage} {/if}
{/if} {#if showReactionPicker} handleReaction(e.detail)} /> {/if}

source:
{#if loading || authChecking}
{#if authChecking} Checking authentication... {:else} Loading... {/if}
{:else if isFirstTime}

Welcome to Feathur

Let's configure your self-hosted chat server

Step {currentStep} of {totalSteps}
{#if error}
{error}
{/if} {#if success}
{success}
{/if} {#if currentStep === 1}

Network Settings

{/if} {#if currentStep === 2}

Authentication Mode

{#if config.auth.mode === 'open_registration'}
{/if}
{/if} {#if currentStep === 3}

Super Admin Account

Password must be at least 9 characters with a number and special character
{/if} {#if currentStep === 4}

Create Normal User (Optional)

You can skip this step and create users later
{/if} {#if currentStep === 5}

Configuration Summary

Network: {config.network.hostname}:{config.network.port} {#if config.network.ssl} (SSL enabled){/if}
Authentication: {config.auth.mode} {#if config.auth.mode === 'open_registration'} (Password: {config.auth.registrationPassword}){/if}
Admin: {config.admin.username}
{#if config.user.username}
User: {config.user.username}
{/if}
{/if} {#if currentStep < 5}
{/if}
{:else}

Welcome Back

{#if error}
{error}
{/if}
Need an account? Register here
{/if}

Admin Dashboard - Fethur

Admin Dashboard

Welcome, {$authStore.user?.username || currentUser?.username || 'User'} ({$authStore.user?.role || currentUser?.role})

{#if error}

{error}

{/if}
{#if isLoading}
Loading...
{:else} {#if activeTab === 'users'}

User Management

{#each users as user} {/each}
ID Username Email Role Status Messages Servers Created Actions
{user.id} {user.username} {user.email} {user.role || 'user'} {user.isOnline ? 'Online' : 'Offline'} {user.messageCount || 0} {user.serverCount || 0} {user.createdAt.toLocaleDateString()}
{:else if activeTab === 'moderation'}

Moderation Tools

Online Users

{#each onlineUsers as user}

{user.username}

IP: {user.ip}

Connected: {new Date(user.connected_at).toLocaleString()}

{/each}
{:else if activeTab === 'health'}

System Health

{#if systemHealth}

Database

{systemHealth.database?.status || 'Unknown'}

Connection: {systemHealth.database?.connection || 'Unknown'}

WebSocket

{systemHealth.websocket?.status || 'Unknown'}

Connections: {systemHealth.websocket?.connections || 0}

API

{systemHealth.api?.status || 'Unknown'}

Uptime: {systemHealth.api?.uptime || 'Unknown'}

{/if}
{:else if activeTab === 'metrics'}

System Metrics

{#if metrics}

User Activity (24h)

Active Users: {metrics.user_activity?.active_users_24h}

New Users: {metrics.user_activity?.new_users_today}

Messages: {metrics.user_activity?.messages_today}

Role Distribution

{#each Object.entries(metrics.role_distribution || {}) as [role, count]}

{role}: {count}

{/each}

Online Users

Currently Online: {metrics.online_users}

{/if}
{:else if activeTab === 'logs'}

Audit Logs

{#each auditLogs as log} {/each}
Time Admin Action Details
{new Date(log.created_at).toLocaleString()} {log.admin_username} {log.action} {log.details}
{:else if activeTab === 'servers'}

Server Management

{#each servers as server}

{server.name}

{server.description || 'No description'}

Channels: {server.channels?.length || 0} Members: {server.members?.length || 0}
{/each}
{/if} {/if} {#if showCreateUserModal}
showCreateUserModal = false}>

Create User

{/if} {#if showEditUserModal}
showEditUserModal = false}>

Edit User

{/if} {#if showModerationModal}
showModerationModal = false}>

{moderationAction.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + moderationAction.slice(1)} User

User: {selectedUser?.username}

{#if moderationAction !== 'unban' && moderationAction !== 'unmute'}
{#if moderationAction === 'ban' || moderationAction === 'mute'}
{/if} {/if}
{/if} {#if showCreateServerModal}
showCreateServerModal = false}>

Create Server

{/if} {#if showEditServerModal}
showEditServerModal = false}>

Edit Server

{/if}

Fethur Chat
{#if currentUser && (currentUser.role === 'admin' || currentUser.role === 'super_admin')}
ðŸ”§ Admin Dashboard
{/if}
ðŸŽ¤ Voice Test
{#if loading}

Loading chat...

{:else if error}

âŒ Error

{error}

{:else if !backendAvailable}

âš ï¸ Backend Server Offline

The backend server is not currently available. This is a demonstration of the frontend interface.

To enable full functionality:

  • Start the backend server (make sure it's running on port 8081)
  • Refresh this page
{:else}
selectServer(e.detail)} />
{#if currentServer} selectChannel(e.detail)} /> {:else}

Select a server to view channels

{/if}
{#if currentChannel} {#if currentChannel.type === 'voice'}
{/if} {:else}

Welcome to Fethur Chat!

Select a channel to start chatting

{/if}
{#if currentServer} {/if}
{#if isConnected} ðŸŸ¢ Connected {:else} ðŸ”´ Disconnected {/if}
Welcome, {$authStore.user?.username || currentUser?.username || 'User'}! {#if $authStore.user?.role || currentUser?.role} ({$authStore.user?.role || currentUser?.role}) {/if}
{/if} { const item = e.detail; showQuickSwitcher = false; if (item.type === 'server') { const server = servers.find(s => s.id === item.id); if (server) selectServer(server); } else if (item.type === 'channel') { const channel = currentServer?.channels?.find(c => c.id === item.id); if (channel) selectChannel(channel); } }} on:close={() => (showQuickSwitcher = false)} />

source:
Voice Test - Fethur

ðŸŽ¤ Voice Test

Test the voice functionality before using it in chat

âš ï¸ Important Requirements

Voice chat requires:

  • HTTPS Connection: Voice features only work over secure connections
  • Microphone Permission: Your browser must allow microphone access
  • Modern Browser: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge (latest versions)

HTTPS Status: {#if isHttps} âœ… Secure Connection {:else} âŒ HTTP Connection (Voice features may not work) {/if}

MediaDevices API: {#if typeof navigator !== 'undefined' && navigator.mediaDevices} âœ… Available {:else} âŒ Not Available {/if}

{#if !isHttps}

âš ï¸ Warning: You're not using HTTPS. Voice features may not work properly. Consider accessing the site via HTTPS.

{/if}

Microphone Test

Test your microphone access and audio settings

{#if !isStreamActive} {:else} {/if}
{#if isStreamActive}
âœ… Microphone is active and working
{/if}

Voice Server Test

Test connection to the voice server and WebRTC functionality

{#if !isConnected} {:else} {/if}
{#if isConnected}
âœ… Connected to voice server
{/if}

Audio Devices

Available input and output devices

Input Devices:

{#each audioDevices.filter(d => d.kind === 'audioinput') as device}
{device.label || `Microphone ${device.deviceId.slice(0, 8)}`} {device.deviceId}
{/each}

Output Devices:

{#each audioDevices.filter(d => d.kind === 'audiooutput') as device}
{device.label || `Speaker ${device.deviceId.slice(0, 8)}`} {device.deviceId}
{/each}
{#if error}
âŒ {error}
{/if}
â† Back to Chat
